fields.label: Company Slogan
fields.name: company_slogan
fields.instructions: Write company slogan here. Max 125 characters.

fields.label: About Us
fields.name: company_about_us
fields.instructions: Write a description about your company here.

fields.label: Our Business
fields.name: company_our_business
fields.instructions: Write a description about what is your company's main business.

fields.label: Mission
fields.name: company_mission
fields.instructions: Write a description about what is your company's mission.

fields.label: Contact Email
fields.name: company_contact_email
fields.instructions: Enter contact email address here. The emails sent from the contact form will be directed to this email.

fields.label: Sketchfab Elements
fields.name: company_sketchfab_repeater
fields.instructions: Add up to 10 Sketchfab elements here.

sub_fields.label: Sketchfab URL:
sub_fields.name: company_sketchfab_url
sub_fields.instructions: Copy the URL from Sketchfab here.

sub_fields.label: Annotation Cycle:
sub_fields.name: company_sketchfab_annotation_cycle
sub_fields.instructions: Setting to any number will start the Autopilot cycle with that duration, in seconds, at each annotation. Give a value between 0 and 20.

sub_fields.label: Auto spin:
sub_fields.name: company_sketchfab_auto_spin
sub_fields.instructions: Setting to any other number will cause the model to automatically spin around the z-axis after loading. The greater the number, the faster the spin. Give a value between 0 and 1

sub_fields.label: 360 Photo URL:
sub_fields.name: company_threesixty_photo_url
sub_fields.instructions: Copy the URL from Theta360 here.

fields.label: Email
fields.name: front_page_contact_email
fields.instructions: Emails from contact form are directed to this email

fields.label: About Us
fields.name: group_of_companies_about_us
fields.instructions: Write a description about the group of companies here.

fields.label: Our Business
fields.name: group_of_companies_our_business
fields.instructions: Write a description about what is your company's main business.

fields.label: Mission
fields.name: group_of_companies_mission
fields.instructions: Write a description about what is your company's mission.

fields.label: Contact Email
fields.name: group_of_companies_contact_email
fields.instructions: Enter contact email address here. The emails sent from the contact form will be directed to this email.

fields.label: Sketchfab Elements
fields.name: group_of_companies_sketchfab_repeater
fields.instructions: Add up to 10 Sketchfab elements here. Leave blank if you want to showcase some of the companies 3D elements.

sub_fields.label: Sketchfab URL:
sub_fields.name: group_of_companies_sketchfab_url
sub_fields.instructions: Copy the URL from Sketchfab here.

sub_fields.label: Annotation Cycle:
sub_fields.name: group_of_companies_sketchfab_annotation_cycle
sub_fields.instructions: Setting to any number will start the Autopilot cycle with that duration, in seconds, at each annotation. Give a value between 0 and 20.

sub_fields.label: Auto spin:
sub_fields.name: group_of_companies_sketchfab_auto_spin
sub_fields.instructions: Setting to any other number will cause the model to automatically spin around the z-axis after loading. The greater the number, the faster the spin. Give a value between 0 and 1

sub_fields.label: 360 Photo URL:
sub_fields.name: group_of_companies_threesixty_photo_url
sub_fields.instructions: Copy the URL from 360 Theta here.
